text: The 1978–79 Illinois Fighting Illini men's basketball team represented the University of Illinois. ==Regular season== In 1978-79 season, Illinois finished seventh in the Big Ten, but went 19-11 overall, including ascension to No. 2 in the national polls after starting the year 15-0. During this season, Illinois upset top-ranked Michigan State and Magic Johnson, 57-55, in one of the school’s most memorable games. It was during this season that Illinois also led the nation in field-goal percentage defense (.404). ===Roster=== SourceMen's Basketball Roster All-Time Illini Rosters ==Schedule== SourceUniversity of
